title: ‘Can You Imagine if We Achieve This Record in Our Jersey?’: How Alexander Vinokourov Threw Everything Behind Mark Cavendish’s Tour Bid
content:
Astana Qazaqstan team supremo keeps the faith in Cavendish’s prospects of making Tour de France history.

Read the full article at ‘Can You Imagine if We Achieve This Record in Our Jersey?’: How Alexander Vinokourov Threw Everything Behind Mark Cavendish’s Tour Bid on Velo.
author: sstokes
